name: Laser.zh
author: Moosh
info: This is a header of mine that I made for bosses that use laser weapons.
description: This is a header of mine that I made for bosses that use laser weapons. While the functions themselves are pretty self explanatory, it comes with no documentation as I made it for personal use. Since it's seen some use in scripts already, I'm putting it on the database for compatibility purposes. Documentation may be added in the future.
setup: Laser functions are meant to be run every frame in a for loop. They work just like draw functions.
